>Now that everyone has angrily repsonded to my other post .. notice how
>easy it is to start a flame war? Please leave correcting inappropriate
>posts to the moderator.
>
>Ask questions, add details, but don't take shots at people who have
>answered or tried to answer someone else's post unless adding or
>corecting details.
>
>The Karana server crashed on halloween and my pl went from consistently
>0 to consistently 10% min with major spikes every day. The server is
>junk and Verant appears to dumb to replace it. I have no problems
>helping anyone who comes but if my cleric wasn't 37 and my necro 22 I'd
>move to a different sever cause this one just adds frustration. This is
>not just my connection either, all the time in every zone you'll see
>shouts "is anyone else having lag/pl/server spikes"
>
>Mal
